name: Ice Breaker (itch) (TREE Industries)
description:
Ice Breaker is a fast paced top down shooter with a unique twist for the Unreal Engine Spring Jam theme.

Try to set the high score by breaking snow blocks and defeating enemies.  Each block broken adds time and also reveals hidden buffs for your robot.

Controls:

  • Move: Left Analog Stick
  • Primary Weapon: Right Analog Stick
  • Secondary Weaspon: Right Trigger

*Note* Hit tab on the main menu if mouse doesn't appear when first loading the game.  This will allow you to use the game controller on the menu.
